notesStmt.note: Publisher and date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Blank order summoning a 24-man jury before the Clerke of the Market to rate food and shelter prices, and test weights and measures.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
